I am looking to create a program that will scan through an arc file looking=
 for application/octet. If it finds one it will extract the associated file=
, scan it with a few different anti-virus programs and then report the resu=
lt.
 
First, what ideas, cautions, etc. can this group provide me before I =
begin this project.
Second, has anyone started or completed such a project?=

Third, I've scanned the Internet looking for details of the arc files, but=
 still do not know the exact details of the offsets. For instance, I'll nee=
d to know the offset of the application/octet listing.
 
Any thoughts, comm=
ents, criticisms are welcome.
